Pocket-sized and killer fast racing. Exhibition aerobatics, Cybertown flyovers, a chance to try and pilot it. We don't run bayraktars.
Místo zasvěcené virtuálním hrám a hrátká: A place dedicated to virtual games and play. Arcade games, headsets, LAN parties. Beware highly addictive!
Plácek otevírá spoustu možností, jak roz: Plácek opens up a lot of opportunities to spin and multiply your credit account. Or go broke...
Bude? No jasně! Bez kvéru ani ránu! A ta: Will it be here? Oh, yeah! No gun, no fun! And this is where they teach you how to hold it and use it. Peashooters, BBgun, targets and CQB, laser simulator!
Peckovní aréna vyrostla v ghettu za Radn: Awesome arena grew up in the ghetto behind Radnice. Now you can settle scores there with dart guns!
Pád lodi Ikaros si zahrajete v útrobách: The fall of the Ikaros ship will be played in the bowels of the underground of Kasárna. Your nerves will be stretched out to the oblivion! And not only them.
Světlonoši otevřou laserové bludiště v p: Světlonoši open a laser maze in an underground bunker. Weave your way through the laser beams to the reward at the end. The flexibility will come handy.
Světlonoši podruhé! Tentokrát s již lege: Světlonoši for the second time! This time with the now legendary Cybertown tour. Certified guides will let you in on the various secrets of our town and the interesting places in the area.
Rezavý krámy a polofunkční mašiny pro va: You don't want to miss REZ and their rusty machines made in the Wasteland for your enjoyment! Rusty Box, Jukebox... and the legendary Booz-o-mat is back!
